body: I think you can/should use resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/data/python/ops/contrib_op_loader.py is an example of this (I don't think you have to break it out into a separate file/build rule, but you can if you want).
